name: part_007
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】紫咲シオン 5th Anniversary LIVE【#紫咲シオン5周年記念⁠】 [KdFYu1feK30]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Shion Murasaki and Gura Gawr perform 'Happy Wedding Front Song' in a church-themed 3D stage.
Shion Murasaki and Aqua Minato perform 'Hana no Tou' in a classroom-themed 3D stage.

subtitles.original:
あれなんかちょっといい感じ？
未来予想図を描いちゃう感じ？
subtitles.english:
Wait, is this a good vibe?
Like drawing a vision for the future?

subtitles.original: 客観的に見てお似合いやん
subtitles.english: Objectively speaking, we're a good match

subtitles.original: 趣味とか好きな音楽似てるにゃん
subtitles.english: Our hobbies and favorite music are similar

subtitles.original: まんざらでもない顔してるにゃん
subtitles.english: You're making a face like you don't mind it

subtitles.original:
あれなんかちょっといい感じ？
未来予想図を描いちゃう感じ？
subtitles.english:
Wait, is this a good vibe?
Like drawing a vision for the future?

subtitles.original: やっぱり出会いって必然的にゃん
subtitles.english: Encounters are inevitable after all

subtitles.original: 運命とか信じるタイプやろ
subtitles.english: You're the type to believe in fate, right?

subtitles.original: うちが舵持ってあげる
subtitles.english: I'll take the helm

subtitles.original: 愛とか 恋とか そういうの 吹っ飛ばして
subtitles.english: Blowing away love and romance and all that

subtitles.original: 直感で動いてみたらええやん
subtitles.english: Just move on intuition

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけ冷やかしてみてもいいかな
subtitles.english: Can I tease you just a little bit?

subtitles.original:
キッス！キッス！キッス！キッス！
キッス！キッス！キッス！からの
subtitles.english:
Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! Kiss!
Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! And then...

subtitles.original:
入籍！入籍！入籍！入籍！
入籍！入籍！入籍！ノリで
subtitles.english:
Marriage registration! Marriage registration! (x7)
Just for the hell of it

subtitles.original:
入籍してみたらええやん
君らお似合いやん それハッピーやん
subtitles.english:
Why not just get married?
You two look good together. That's happy

subtitles.original: これから一生ずっと一緒に居るやん速攻
subtitles.english: You'll be together for the rest of your lives

subtitles.original: 婚姻届 役所に届けよう
subtitles.english: Let's submit the marriage certificate right away

subtitles.original:
入籍してみたらええやん
後のことは責任取らんけど
subtitles.english:
Why not just get married?
I won't take responsibility for what happens later

subtitles.original:
きっと上手くいくよ
何となくそんな 気がしてるんだ
subtitles.english:
It'll surely work out
I just have a feeling that it will

subtitles.original:
あれ本当にちょっといい感じ？
前触れもなく当然にゃん
subtitles.english:
Wait, is this really a good vibe?
It came naturally without warning

subtitles.original: 本格的に感じ出してるにゃん
subtitles.english: I'm starting to feel it for real

subtitles.original: マジで市役所行こうとしてるにゃん
subtitles.english: You're really trying to go to the city hall

subtitles.original: え、マジで市役所行こうとしてるやん
subtitles.english: Wait, you're really trying to go to the city hall

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？マジ大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Are you okay? Seriously?

subtitles.original: え、君らがいいならいいやけど、いいの？
subtitles.english: Well, if you're okay with it, is it okay?

subtitles.original: ほんまにそれで大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Is that really okay?

subtitles.original: え、ほんまに大丈夫なん？
subtitles.english: Wait, is it really okay?

subtitles.original: 愛とか 恋とか そういうの 吹っ飛ばして
subtitles.english: Blowing away love and romance and all that

subtitles.original: 直感で動いてみたらええやん
subtitles.english: Just move on intuition

subtitles.original: 冷静な判断 今は捨ててさ
subtitles.english: Throw away calm judgment for now

subtitles.original:
キッス！キッス！キッス！キッス！
キッス！キッス！キッス！からの
subtitles.english:
Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! Kiss!
Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! And then...

subtitles.original:
入籍！入籍！入籍！入籍！
入籍！入籍！入籍！ノリで
subtitles.english:
Marriage registration! Marriage registration! (x7)
Just for the hell of it

subtitles.original:
入籍してみたらええやん
君らお似合いやん それハッピーやん
subtitles.english:
Why not just get married?
You two look good together. That's happy

subtitles.original: これから一生ずっと一緒に居るやん速攻
subtitles.english: You'll be together for the rest of your lives

subtitles.original: ゼクシィ買って 式に備えよう
subtitles.english: Let's buy Zexy and prepare for the ceremony

subtitles.original:
入籍してみたらええやん
多分2年以内に別れると
subtitles.english:
Why not just get married?
Though I think you'll probably break up within two years

subtitles.original:
心のどこかで 思っているけど
秘密にしておくね
subtitles.english:
Somewhere in my heart, I'm thinking that
But I'll keep it a secret

subtitles.original: 金銭感覚 物の価値観 身体の相性
subtitles.english: Financial sense, values, physical compatibility

subtitles.original:
言えない過去や 消したい過去は
お互いにたくさんあるけれど
subtitles.english:
Unspeakable pasts or pasts we want to erase
We both have many of them, but

subtitles.original: モラハラ ギャンブル 年収と嫁姑問題
subtitles.english: Moral harassment, gambling, income and in-law issues

subtitles.original:
どうしようもない 浮気癖とか
不安はあるけれどさ
subtitles.english:
Uncontrollable cheating habits and such
There are anxieties, but

subtitles.original:
ノリで入籍してみたらええやん
君らお似合いやん それハッピーやん
subtitles.english:
Why not just get married for the hell of it?
You two look good together. That's happy

subtitles.original:
これから一生ずっと一緒に居るやん速攻
婚姻届 役所に届けよう
subtitles.english:
You'll be together for the rest of your lives
Let's submit the marriage certificate right away

subtitles.original:
入籍してみたらええやん
後のことは責任取らんけど
subtitles.english:
Why not just get married?
I won't take responsibility for what happens later

subtitles.original:
きっと上手くいくよ
何となくそんな 気がしてるんだ
subtitles.english:
It'll surely work out
I just have a feeling that it will

subtitles.original:
入籍してみた ええやん
きっと2年以内に別れるけど
subtitles.english:
We tried getting married. It's fine
Though we'll surely break up within two years

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original:
ノリで入籍してみたら ええやん ええやん ええやん
イェーイ！
subtitles.english:
Why not just get married for the hell of it?
It's fine, it's fine, it's fine. Yeah!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！ おめでとう！ 結婚おめでとう！
subtitles.english:
Congratulations! Congratulations!
Congratulations on your marriage!

subtitles.original: Happy Wedding!
subtitles.english: Happy Wedding!

subtitles.original: 君が持ってきた漫画くれた 知らない名前の花
subtitles.english:
The manga you brought gave me
a flower with a name I didn't know

subtitles.original: 今日はまだ来ないかな 初めての感情 知ってしまった
subtitles.english:
I wonder if they're coming today
I've learned a new feeling

subtitles.original: 窓辺飾った絵画 なぞる一人で宇宙を旅して
subtitles.english:
A painting decorating the windowsill
Tracing it, traveling the universe alone

subtitles.original: それだけでいいはずだったのに
subtitles.english: That should have been enough, and yet

subtitles.original: 君の手を握ってしまったら
subtitles.english: If I end up holding your hand

subtitles.original: 孤独を知らないこの街には
subtitles.english: In this city that doesn't know loneliness

subtitles.original: もう二度と帰ってくることは
subtitles.english: I probably won't be able to

subtitles.original: できないのでしょう
subtitles.english: Return ever again

subtitles.original: 君が手を差し伸べた
subtitles.english: You reached out your hand
